column4: Hello! I had such a failure with the 10.04 liveCd. I wanted to install xchat, so I allowed the universe and multivers... and "it did stuff" and after a looooong while it told me I was _running out of space___  What in the World?? I am running a live CD. This is totally bogus. How does this happen? What can I do? Please help.
